definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: China both values friendship and stands on principles.
sentences.chinese: 中國既重情義，也講原則。

sentences.english: They said the city has no real bonds of friendship between people.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，城市裏人與人之間沒有真正的情義。

sentences.english: It's rare to find a large company with a heart.
sentences.chinese: 很少能找到個有情義的大公司。

sentences.english: In the crowd, I find you, everything gets colorful.
sentences.chinese: 人海之中，找到了你，一切變了有情義。

sentences.english: Who said no, not only for the traveler friendship sweet.
sentences.chinese: 誰言異類無情義，只爲過客不留香。

sentences.english: She prefers the intelligent, talented and affectionate man.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡聰明，有才華，有情義的人。

sentences.english: That I thought would last somehow.
sentences.chinese: 你我的情義將天長地久。

sentences.english: Over the last 21 years, I have found loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的21年裏，我找到了情義。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, even between strangers than there are bonds of friendship between family members.
sentences.chinese: 出人意料的是，陌生人之間比親人之間還要有情義。

sentences.english: But since the tifosi dilemma, how to choice, can good conscience?
sentences.chinese: 但自古情義兩難全，他該如何抉擇，才能無愧於心？

sentences.english: I find you among piggies; ambience filled with love.
sentences.chinese: 人海之中，找到了你，一切變了有情義。

definition: to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
the world in chaos/troubled times/(in Buddhism) the mortal world
if the family lives in harmony all affairs will prosper (idiom)
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
